# PKInkingToolReference

**Class**

An object that defines the drawing characteristics (width, color, pen style) to use when drawing lines on a canvas view.

## Declaration

```swift
class PKInkingToolReference
```

## Overview

A [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKInkingTool-swift.struct] object supports the creation of new content on a [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKCanvasView]. With an inking tool, the canvas turns touch input from the user into a continuously rendered stroke. The value in the [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKInkingToolReference/width] property determines the base width of that stroke; however, that base value also depends on input from Apple Pencil, including force, azimuth, and angle data.

Create an inking tool programmatically, or display a [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKToolPicker] object and from which a user can select a tool. Assign the resulting object to the [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKCanvasView/tool-6str6] property of your [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKCanvasView] object. The canvas uses any subsequent touch sequences to draw new content on the canvas. Assigning a new inking tool doesn’t change the characteristics for any previously drawn strokes.

## Creating an inking tool

- **init(inkType:color:width:)**: Creates an ink tool object with the specified color and line width values.
- **init(inkType:color:)**: Creates an ink tool object with the default line width and the specified color.
- **init(ink:width:)**: Create an inking tool with the specified ink and width.

## Getting the inking tool attributes

- **color**: The color of the ink.
- **width**: The base line width for new content.
- **ink**: The ink that this tool creates strokes with.

## Getting the tool type

- **inkType**: The tool type that determines the shape of the rendered content.

## Working with colors

- **convert(_:from:to:)**: Converts a color from one user interface style to another.

## Getting the standard ink widths

- **defaultWidth(forInkType:)**: Returns the default line width for the specified tool type.
- **minimumWidth(forInkType:)**: Returns the minimum allowed line width for the specified tool type.
- **maximumWidth(forInkType:)**: Returns the maximum allowed line width for the specified tool type.

## Supporting backward compatibility

- **requiredContentVersion**: The version of PencilKit necessary to use the inking tool.

## Initializers

- **init(inkType:color:width:azimuth:)**

## Instance Properties

- **azimuth**: The base angle of the ink.

## Type Methods

- **invertColor(_:)**: Converts a color from light to dark appearance or vice versa.
